newsitem.title: USA: Pall drops authorization for shr buyback.
newsitem.headline: Pall drops authorization for shr buyback.

text.p: Pall Corp said Tuesday its board has withdrawn authorization for the balance of up to $40 million to buy back the company's shares.
Pall had already spent $10 million of the authorization.
The stock repurchase program had been authorized in late February.
Pall designs, manufactures and markets disposable filters, membranes and other fluid clarification and separation devices for the health care, aeropower and fluid processing markets.
